                  <path d="M4.67716 12.5006L6.42111 11.4597C6.58129 11.3657 6.79089 11.3187 6.99984 11.3185V1.16663C6.63244 1.1656 6.26415 1.44641 5.98367 2.00906L4.95713 4.07914C4.81714 4.3673 4.44385 4.6437 4.13472 4.69663L2.27409 5.00831C1.08422 5.20827 0.810087 6.07864 1.66166 6.93725L3.10816 8.3957C3.35314 8.64268 3.48729 9.11903 3.41147 9.46017L2.99735 11.2656C2.67072 12.6887 3.42896 13.2475 4.67716 12.5006Z" fill="#5A2006" stroke="#5A2006" stroke-width="1.3125" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
                </svg>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="card">
            <img src="searchImages/book.png" alt="">
            <div class="book-info">
              <div class="text">
                <p class="title">
                  The Lord Of The Rings
                </p>
                <p class="auther">
                  J.R.R. Tolkien
                </p>
              </div>
              <div class="book-rate">
                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 14 14" fill="none">
                  <path d="M8.0076 2.00906L9.03415 4.07914C9.17415 4.3673 9.54743 4.6437 9.86243 4.69663L11.723 5.00831C12.9129 5.20827 13.1929 6.07864 12.3355 6.93725L10.889 8.3957C10.644 8.64268 10.5099 9.11903 10.5856 9.46017L10.9998 11.2656C11.3264 12.6946 10.574 13.2475 9.31999 12.5006L7.57599 11.4597C7.26105 11.2715 6.74194 11.2715 6.42111 11.4597L4.67716 12.5006C3.42896 13.2475 2.67072 12.6887 2.99735 11.2656L3.41147 9.46017C3.48729 9.11903 3.35314 8.64268 3.10816 8.3957L1.66166 6.93725C0.810087 6.07864 1.08422 5.20827 2.27409 5.00831L4.13472 4.69663C4.44385 4.6437 4.81714 4.3673 4.95713 4.07914L5.98367 2.00906C6.54361 0.885814 7.4535 0.885814 8.0076 2.00906Z" fill="#5A2006" stroke="#5A2006" stroke-width="1.3125" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
                </svg>
                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 14 14" fill="none">
                  <path d="M8.0076 2.00906L9.03415 4.07914C9.17415 4.3673 9.54743 4.6437 9.86243 4.69663L11.723 5.00831C12.9129 5.20827 13.1929 6.07864 12.3355 6.93725L10.889 8.3957C10.644 8.64268 10.5099 9.11903 10.5856 9.46017L10.9998 11.2656C11.3264 12.6946 10.574 13.2475 9.31999 12.5006L7.57599 11.4597C7.26105 11.2715 6.74194 11.2715 6.42111 11.4597L4.67716 12.5006C3.42896 13.2475 2.67072 12.6887 2.99735 11.2656L3.41147 9.46017C3.48729 9.11903 3.35314 8.64268 3.10816 8.3957L1.66166 6.93725C0.810087 6.07864 1.08422 5.20827 2.27409 5.00831L4.13472 4.69663C4.44385 4.6437 4.81714 4.3673 4.95713 4.07914L5.98367 2.00906C6.54361 0.885814 7.4535 0.885814 8.0076 2.00906Z" fill="#5A2006" stroke="#5A2006" stroke-width="1.3125" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
                </svg>
                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 14 14" fill="none">

                </svg>
                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 14 14" fill="none">

                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="14" height="14" viewBox="0 0 14 14" fill="none">

                </svg>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
    
         
        </div>
        
      </div>
      <div class="pagination">
        <button class="before" >
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none">
          <path d="M12.5 5C12.5 5 7.5 8.68242 7.5 10C7.5 11.3177 12.5 15 12.5 15" stroke="#5A2006" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
        </svg>
      </button>
        <button class="active">1</button>
        <button class="unactive">2</button>
        <button class="unactive">3</button>
        <button class="unactive">4</button>
        <button class="unactive">5</button>
        <button class="next"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none">
          <path d="M7.50004 5C7.50004 5 12.5 8.68242 12.5 10C12.5 11.3177 7.5 15 7.5 15" stroke="#5A2006" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
        </svg></button>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

css

* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  outline: none;
  border: none;
  list-style: none;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
button {
  transition: 0.5s;
}
body {
  font-family: "Bricolage Grotesque";
}
.frame{
  display: flex;
flex-direction: column;
align-items: center;
}

.searchPage {
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 24px;
  min-height: 100vh;
  background-image: url("/searchImages/bg.jpg");

}
/* -------------------- */

.container {
  display: flex;
  max-width: 1184px;
  padding: var(--Space-16px, 16px);
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: var(--Space-16px, 16px);
  align-self: stretch;
  background-color: white;
  border-radius: var(--Space-16px, 16px);

}
.search-bar {
  display: flex;
  max-width: 1184px;
  padding: 0px 8px;
  align-items: center;
  gap: var(--Space-16px, 16px);
  align-self: stretch;
}
.search-input {
  display: flex;
  padding: 7px 8px;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  flex: 1;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: #f2f2f2;
}
.searchIcon {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
}
.search-input input {
  background-color: #f2f2f2;
  outline: none;
  border: none;
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0 10px;
  font-size: 14px;

}
.search-btn {
  display: flex;
  padding: 7px 12px 7px 16px;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: #5a2006;
  /* ----------- */
  color: #fff;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 700;
  letter-spacing: 0.06px;
}
.btn-ico {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
}
.search-btn:hover {
  background-color: #c17a46;
}

.results {
  display: flex;
  padding: 0px 9px;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 10px;
}

  font-size: 24px;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 140%; /* 33.6px */
  letter-spacing: 0.12px;
  color: black;
}
.content {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: 16px;
  /* background-color: #C17A46; */
  align-self: stretch;
}

  display: flex;
  width: 210px;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: 8px;
}

  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-start;
  align-self: stretch;
}

  display: flex;
  padding: 8px;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  align-self: stretch;
}

  flex: 1 0 0;
  color: black;
  font-size: 17px;
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 160%; /* 27.2px */
  letter-spacing: 0.085px;
}

  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
}

  display: flex;
  padding: 0px 8px 8px 8px;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: 4px;
  align-self: stretch;
}

  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  color: black;
}

  appearance: none;
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  font-size: 11px;
  font-weight: 500;
  line-height: 150%; /* 16.5px */
  letter-spacing: 0.055px;
  border: 2px solid #5a2006;
  border-radius: 5px;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
  color: black;
}
.condition {
  display: none;
}

  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-start;
  align-self: stretch;
}

  display: flex;
  padding: 8px;
  align-items: center;

  justify-content: space-between;

  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;

  font-weight: 700;

  letter-spacing: 0.085px;
}

  flex-direction: column;

  gap: 4px;
  align-self: stretch;
}

  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  color: black;
}

  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
}

  font-weight: 500;
  line-height: 150%; /* 16.5px */
  letter-spacing: 0.055px;
  color: black;
}

  display: flex;
  width: 210px;

  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;

  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;

  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;

}

  align-self: stretch;
  border-radius: 8px;
}

  align-self: stretch;

  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: flex-start;

  font-family: "Bricolage Grotesque";

  font-weight: 700;

}

  color: #252829;
  font-family: "Bricolage Grotesque";
  font-size: 11px;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 150%; /* 16.5px */
  letter-spacing: 0.055px;
}

  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 3.5px;
}

  width: 14px;
  height: 14px;
}

  display: flex;
  padding: 8px 0px;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
  align-self: stretch;
}

  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  background-color: transparent;
}

  display: flex;
  width: 38px;
  padding: 8px 16px;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background: var(--Button-main-d, #5a2006);
color: white;
}

  display: flex;
  width: 38px;
  padding: 8px 16px;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  border: 1.5px solid var(--Button-main-d, #5a2006);
  background: #fff;  
}

    background-color: transparent;
}
.group{
    display: none;
}
/* --------------tablet screen---------------- */
@media screen and (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 1199px){
    .content{
 gap: 8px;
    }
.sidebar{
    width: 177px;
}

    display: flex;
padding-right: 8px;
align-items: flex-start;
align-content: flex-start;
gap: 16px 9px;
flex: 1 0 0;
flex-wrap: wrap;
}
.group{
    display: none;
}
}

    display: flex;
    max-width: 1184px;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 8px;
    align-self: stretch;
}

    display: flex;
align-items: center;
gap: 10px;
flex: 1 0 0;
}

font-size: 12px;
}

    display: flex;
    padding: 7px 12px 7px 16px;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 4px;
}

    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
}

    display: flex;
height: 34px;
max-width: 672px;
align-items: center;
gap: 10px;
align-self: stretch;
}

    border-radius: 8px;

justify-content: center;
align-items: center;
gap: 4px;
text-align: center;
font-size: 12px;
font-weight: 700;
color: white;
}
.results{
    display: flex;
justify-content: center;
align-items: center;
gap: 10px;
}
.results p{
    color: var(--BG-Black, #000);
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: 160%; /* 22.4px */
    letter-spacing: 0.07px;
}
.sidebar{
    display: none;
}
.books-content{
 display: flex;
align-items: flex-start;
align-content: flex-start;
justify-content: space-between;
gap: 8px;
align-self: stretch;
flex-wrap: wrap;
}
.card{
    display: flex;
align-items: flex-start;
gap: 8px;
align-self: stretch;
flex-direction: row;
}
.card img{
    width: 44px;
height: 66px;
border-radius: 2px;
}

    display: flex;
flex-direction: column;
align-items: flex-start;
gap: 2px;
flex: 1 0 0;
}

    display: flex;
flex-direction: column;
align-items: flex-start;
}
.book-info .title , .auther{
    font-size: 11px;
}

.book-rate{
    display: flex;
align-items: center;
gap: 3.5px;
}

    display: flex;

justify-content: center;

align-self: stretch;
}

    width: 20px;
height: 20px;
}

}
